trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified file

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the name of the specified file

target.mrk: Retrieves the name of the specified file

trans-unit.source: The name and location of a file.

seg-source.mrk: The name and location of a file.

target.mrk: The name and location of a file.

trans-unit.source: _WinAPI_GetFileTitle() should only be called with legal file names; using an illegal file name has an undefined result.

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_GetFileTitle() should only be called with legal file names; using an illegal file name has an undefined result.

target.mrk: _WinAPI_GetFileTitle() should only be called with legal file names; using an illegal file name has an undefined result.

trans-unit.source: _WinAPI_GetFileTitle() returns the string that the system would use to display the file name to the user.

seg-source.mrk: _WinAPI_GetFileTitle() returns the string that the system would use to display the file name to the user.

target.mrk: _WinAPI_GetFileTitle() returns the string that the system would use to display the file name to the user.

trans-unit.source: The display name includes an extension only if that is the user's preference for displaying file names.

seg-source.mrk: The display name includes an extension only if that is the user's preference for displaying file names.

target.mrk: The display name includes an extension only if that is the user's preference for displaying file names.

trans-unit.source: This means that the returned string may not accurately identify the file if it is used in calls to file system functions.

seg-source.mrk: This means that the returned string may not accurately identify the file if it is used in calls to file system functions.

target.mrk: This means that the returned string may not accurately identify the file if it is used in calls to file system functions.
